law.catch_line: Effect Of Renumbering Or Redesignation Of Provisions Or Sections In Statutes Or Codes Of The State Of California Which Are Referred To In The Los Angeles Municipal Code.
law.full_text:
EFFECT OF RENUMBERING OR REDESIGNATION OF PROVISIONS OR SECTIONS IN STATUTES OR CODES OF THE STATE OF CALIFORNIA WHICH ARE REFERRED TO IN THE LOS ANGELES MUNICIPAL CODE. (Added by Ord. No. 116,431, Eff. 7/30/60.)
Whenever in this Code reference is made to any designation or numbered provision of any Statute or Code of the State of California, such reference shall be deemed to be to such provision or section as it may be redesignated or renumbered from time to time by act of the Legislature of the State of California in amending or recodifying such Statute, Code or provision or section thereof, to the extent that by such legislative act the intent and meaning of the provision or section remains substantially unchanged.

dublin_core.Title: Effect Of Renumbering Or Redesignation Of Provisions Or Sections In Statutes Or Codes Of The State Of California Which Are Referred To In The Los Angeles Municipal Code.

law.plain_text:
LOS ANGELES MUNICIPAL CODE
EFFECT OF RENUMBERING OR REDESIGNATION OF PROVISIONS OR SECTIONS IN STATUTES OR CODES OF THE STATE OF CALIFORNIA WHICH ARE REFERRED TO IN THE LOS ANGELES MUNICIPAL CODE. (§ 11.05)
EFFECT OF RENUMBERING OR REDESIGNATION OF PROVISIONS OR SECTIONS IN STATUTES OR CODES OF THE STATE OF CALIFORNIA WHICH ARE REFERRED TO IN THE LOS ANGELES MUNICIPAL CODE. (Added by Ord. No. 116,431, Eff. 7/30/60.) Whenever in this Code reference is made to any designation or numbered provision of any Statute or Code of the State of California, such reference shall be deemed to be to such provision or section as it may be redesignated or renumbered from time to time by act of the Legislature of the State of California in amending or recodifying such Statute, Code or provision or section thereof, to the extent that by such legislative act the intent and meaning of the provision or section remains substantially unchanged.
